mapper.sql: id, packing_offshelf_number, order_number, wave_number, allocation_id, task_detail_number, warehouse_id, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, ower_id, ower_code, ower_name, material_id, material_code, material_name, warehouse_area_id, warehouse_area_code, warehouse_area_name, warehouse_location_id, warehouse_location_code, container_id, container_code, container_name, offshelf_location_id, offshelf_location_code, offshelf_location_name, wait_offshelf_account, real_offshelf_account, unit, status,receive_time,finish_time, delivery_workstation_id,delivery_workstation_code, delivery_workstation_name, delivery_sowing_id, delivery_sowing_code,delivery_sowing_name,is_issue, batch_code, material_production_date, custom_field1, custom_field2, custom_field3,tenant_code, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, distribution_batch_code, distribution_material_production_date, distribution_custom_field1, distribution_custom_field2, distribution_custom_field3,shelf_id,shelf_code
mapper.select:
select wpt.warehouse_id warehouseId,wpt.warehouse_name warehouseName,wpt.packing_offshelf_number packingOffshelfNumber,m.material_code materialCode,m.material_type materialType,m.material_name materialName,wpt.ower_name owerName,wpt.batch_code batchCode,wpt.material_production_date materialProductionDate,wpt.real_offshelf_account realOffshelfAccount,wpt.unit,wpt.container_name containerName,wl.shelf_code shelfCode,wpt.delivery_workstation_name deliveryWorkstationName,wpt.create_by createBy,wpt.create_time createTime,wpt.update_by updateBy,wpt.update_time updateTime from wms_packing_offshelf_task wpt left join wms_material_basic_info m on m.id = wpt.material_id and m.is_deleted = 0 left join wms_warehouse_location wl on wpt.offshelf_location_code = wl.code and wl.is_deleted = 0 where wpt.is_deleted = 0
AND wpt.material_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shelfOrder.materialCode}, '%')
AND wpt.warehouse_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shelfOrder.warehouse}, '%')
AND so.packing_offshelf_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shelfOrder.orderNum}, '%')
AND wpt.create_time = ${shelfOrder.createTime}
and wpt.ower_id in
#{id}

SELECT wooi.id orderId, wooi.order_number orderNumber, wooi.notice_order_number noticeOrderNumber, wooi.order_status_type orderStatus, wooitm.id materialId, wooitm.material_id materialTypeId, wooitm.material_code materialTypeCode, wooitm.material_name materialTypeName, wooitm.status_type materialStatus, wooitdm.id distributionMaterialId, wpot.`status` packingMaterialStatus FROM wms_outbound_order_info wooi, wms_outbound_order_info_to_material wooitm, wms_outbound_order_info_to_distribution_material wooitdm, wms_packing_offshelf_task wpot WHERE wooi.is_deleted = 0 AND wooitm.is_deleted = 0 AND wooitdm.is_deleted = 0 AND wpot.is_deleted = 0 AND wooi.order_number = wooitm.order_number AND wooitm.id = wooitdm.order_material_id AND wooitdm.id = wpot.allocation_id AND wpot.order_number = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY wooi.order_number, wooitm.id
